member.name: M:USDA.ARS.GRIN.GRINGlobal.API.Web.Controllers.SpeciesController.GetSpecies(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.param: The GRIN-Global unique ID of the species.
(Boolean) Indicates whether or not to include all common names associated with the species.

member.name: M:USDA.ARS.GRIN.GRINGlobal.API.Web.Controllers.SpeciesController.SearchSpecies(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Searches for species taxa using one or more criteria.
member.param: The GRIN-defined unique ID of the taxon.
All or part of the genus name.
All or part of the species epithet.
Indicates whether or not to search only accepted names.
(true/false) Indicates whether or not to retrieve common names associated with this taxon.
(true/false) Indicates whether or not to include geographic distributions associated with this taxon.
(true/false) Indicates whether or not to include synonyms associated with this taxon.
(true/false) Indicates whether or not to include ciations associated with this taxon.
The page number at which to begin (default 1).
The desired size of each page of search results (maximum 25).
